sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Header() { return (
  • Services

    Development & Maintenance

    • Mobile app development & maintenance
    • Web app development & maintenance
    • UI/UX Design

    Accelerate

    • Sales Force
    • Cloud Digital Transfomation

    Insight

    • Ai & Automation
    • Statistical Data Analytics
    • Business Intelligence
    • Computer vision
    • Big data analytics
    • Digital Signal Processing
    • Natural Language processing
    • Deep learning
    • AI & Gaming

    Experience

    • BlackBerry Cyber Security
    • SOC
  • Industries
    • Health
    • Chemicals
    • Retail
    • Automative
    • Dental
    • Consumer Goods
    • BFSI
    • Energy
    • Oil and Gas
    • Capital Markets
    • Insurance
    • Media and Entertainment
  • About Scriptics

    about scriptics

    • Know Us
    • Case Studies

    Our structure

    • Work Strategy
    • Technologies we follow
    • Industries we serve

    Discover us

    • Contact Us
    • Locate Us
    • Subscribe to newsletter
  • Blogs
) } export default Header
